Rok Studios bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Naijiria
Ụlọ mmepụta ya dị na Anthony Village, Lagos
Mary Remmy Njoku guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2013. Na mgbakwunye na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ya, Rok Studios emepụtala ihe karịrị usoro TV iri na abụọ.
Ihe ndị a ma ama sitere na Rok Studios gụnyere: Hazeezat (2014), Thy Will Be Done (ihe nkiri), Festac Town, - TV Series (2014), na A Northern Affair (2014) (nke Mary Remmy Njoku mepụtara).
Mary Njoku malitere ROK na Sky, netwọk na-agbasa na UK na Naịjirịa High Commission na UK na afọ  2016.
N'ọnwa Julaị na afọ 2019, Canal+ Group nwetara ROK. Mary Njoku nọgidere dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke ROK n'okpuru nnweta Canal +.
